about_the_game: This game features a retro cartoon style with bright and magical elements, creating a strong fairy tale atmosphere at first glance. Players take on the role of an old witch riding a broom, struggling to survive on a road full of obstacles. There are various obstacles in the game, including difficult to cross rivers, raging flames, and unexpected small monsters, which increase the challenges of the game. Players can control the left and right movements of the old witch. The game controls are simple and intuitive. In addition, the game features exquisite graphics, from the background to character actions, providing players with an immersive gaming experience.

Players can control the left and right movements of the old witch. The game controls are simple and intuitive. In addition, the game features exquisite graphics, from the background to character actions, providing players with an immersive gaming experience.
name: Astonishing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
